title: Which came first... the knife, spoon or fork?
description:
Hi! It's the Trusty Narrator!

Our friends at MEL Science are BACK with amazing new monthly science kits for kids --- and a special discount for our Smartypants. Use code SMARTY at MEL Science or just go to this link and get started doing science, every month, right at home!

Who Smarted's? Sea Camp Live is BACK for an encore presentation Oct 18 19 and 20 due to popular demand. Click here to join now - $100 off expires Oct 11!

Every have a parent tell you "stop eating with your hands!" Well, guess what Mom and Dad - that's only possible thanks to the invention of utensils. But why and when did humans go from "Keep eating with your hands" to "use your fork and knife!" You're going to find out all about it on today's episode of Who Smarted?

Quickest way to hear YOUR name on Who Smarted? Leave us a great 5-star review on Apple podcasts, include your first name, and you might hear yours on an upcoming episode.

For free home science activities and helpful stuff for classrooms and homeschool sign-up for our free newsletter at www.WhoSmarted.com

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
